package.name: Image_GIS
package.description: Generating maps on demand can be a hard job as most often you don't have the maps you need in digital form. But you can generate your own maps based on raw, digital data files which are available for free on the net. This package provides a parser for the most common format for geographical data, the Arcinfo/E00 format as well as renderers to produce images using GD or Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG). Prepared by Nedjo Rogers (nedjo@gworks.ca) of the Mapbuilder project, this version of the package includes proposed enhancements for parsing database files and for providing Open Geospatial Consortium Web Map Service (WMS) support.

release.notes:
+ Added new Layer subclass to Image_GIS and made Parser a property of Layer (rather than directly of Image_GIS).
+ Added class Image_GIS_DataSource to enable multiple data types.
+ Moved styling information (line color) to new Image_GIS_Style class.
+ Added point and polygon parsing to Image_GIS_Parser_E00.
+ Added Image_GIS_Parser_WMS parser subclass to parse web map service data types.
+ Added Image_GIS_Parser_WKT parser subclass to parse database sources in OGC Well Known Text format.
+ Roughed in Image_GIS_Parser_Img parser subclass to parse raster data files. Not yet usable.
* Changed class Image_GIS_LineSet to Image_GIS_FeatureSet (to allow point and polygon storage as well as linestring).
+ Added class Image_GIS_Feature to store information on specific features.
* Moved linestring rendering from Image_GIS_Renderer to Image_GIS_Renderer_GD.
+ Added point, polygon, and WMS image rendering to Image_GIS_Renderer_GD.
+ Added new Service_GIS class and subclasses to provide web map service (WMS) interface to Image_GIS.
* SVG renderer not yet updated to reflect new changes, therefore not usable.
+ Added example files under /docs directory for both Image_GIS and Service_GIS.

* Fixed bug #1179.
* Added/fixed phpDocumentor code documentation.

+ Added caching of parsed data files.
+ Added getRange() method to the Image_GIS and Image_GIS_Renderer classes.
* Changed the Image_GIS constructor to accept an associative parameter array as its only argument.
Note: This breaks backwards compatibility.
* The SVG renderer now uses the XML_SVG package instead of the XML_Tree package.
* Factored the handling of Line Sets out into a separate class.
* Fixed handling of negative coordinates.
* Fixed a bug that kept a debugging message from beeing printed.
* Fixed incompatibilities with PHP 5.
